name: Battlegrounds: At Enemy Gates
description:
Assemble your army from a diverse roaster of vehicles and planes. Launch missiles, call planes and blow up tanks with nukes on the battlefield.
Let loose the engine of war in combat. Remember to spend money donated to your aid carefully or risk loose the war.

Features
.Easy to learn
.Lots of replayability
.Unlimited strategic combinations
.Spawn tanks and planes
.Infinite explosions
.Fire missiles and nukes
.Manage your war finance
